CoREMOF_tools documentationÔÉÅ

Welcome to the CoREMOF_tools documentation! Below you will find the API reference and user guides.

InstallationÔÉÅ

To install CoREMOF_tools, use the following command:

pip install CoREMOF-tools

Web ApplicationÔÉÅ

The CoREMOF Web App is available at:

üîó [CoREMOF Web App](https://mof-db.pusan.ac.kr/)

Related PublicationÔÉÅ

For more details on CoREMOF_tools, please refer to the following paper:

  1. Zhao G, Brabson L, Chheda S, Huang J, Kim H, Liu K, et al. CoRE MOF DB: A curated experimental metal-organic framework database with machine-learned properties for integrated material-process screening. ChemRxiv, 2024 DOI: [10.26434/chemrxiv-2024-nvmnr](https://doi.org/10.26434/chemrxiv-2024-nvmnr)

    > This content is a preprint and has not been peer-reviewed.
